responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "EB112A6A47B7FD8DF3F1F2BCF02300C8", "Dearest Ra\'Pha, Along with your standard shipment of Pyrian spices, you will receive the spell for Gem Heart. This should allow you to bond your unconventional codex with a guardian construct of your choosing. What secrets you hide in the sentient bauble is beyond me, but may you keep its secrets from evil agents. Yours truly, Opal Moonwise of the Erantian Warden Ring. ")
name: MADD_0005_AOR_DormBed_12
